page.title: 17SOCIAL CONCERNS.
page.content: Cornwall has the highest percentage of old people,approx 40-45% of the total population of Millbrook. {Sheltered Housing}-20 flats in West St,18 at Millview,4 on the Quay.10 bungalows to be built at Southdown. {West Park Home.}16 residents - 8 locals,approx.90-100 age group oldest Mrs Clayton 104 yrs of age. {Meals on Wheels.}caters for 18 people,Tues.Thurs.18 helpers on rota to cook,deliver,wash.Doctor informs Mrs.Howe of those needing the help. {Torpoint and Rame Disabled Association Meet in Millbrook on Thursday-social activities and shopping. {Activities.}Monday sisterhood,Tuesday whistdrive Play bingo.TARDA committee meeting monthly,go to Christmas pantomimes,have parties and day trips other times of the year.
